chapters.title: Chapter 8: Sea Folk and Kin
chapters.info: Sereille Bagand, p. 199 (223)—Late Aes Sedai of the White Ajah. She was Mistress of Novices when Adeleas and Vandene were novices, and was later raised to the Amyrlin Seat. She was a legend for her harshness. See also Amyrlin Seat; Mistress of Novices.
